category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA114_auxfiles_dwg
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to specify the list of auxiliary file types to be created in Teamcenter together with the related drawing files. For each value specified in the list a dataset of the given type will be created/updated under the same item revision of the drawing being saved. Possible values: dwf dwfx dxf pdf Values are considered as case-insensitive.
